"""Get the report sections for general ledger
 """
 from Products.ERP5Form.Report import ReportSection
 request = context.REQUEST
 portal = context.portal_url.getPortalObject()
 cat_tool = portal.portal_categories
 sim_tool = portal.portal_simulation
 N_ = context.Base_translateString
 
 at_date = request['at_date']
 section_category = request['section_category']
 section_uid = context.Base_getSectionUidListForSectionCategory(
 section_category)
 simulation_state = request['simulation_state']
 from_date = request.get('from_date', None)
 gap = request.get('gap', None)
 omit_empty_accounts = request.get('omit_empty_accounts', True)
 display_categories = request.get('display_categories', False)
 period_start_date = context\
 .Base_getAccountingPeriodStartDateForSectionCategory(
 section_category=section_category, date=from_date or at_date)
 
 # currency precision
 currency = portal.Base_getCurrencyForSection(request['section_category'])
 precision = portal.account_module.getQuantityPrecisionFromResource(currency)
 request.set('precision', precision)
 
 # TODO
 omit_grouping_reference = request.get('omit_grouping_reference', False)
 
 request.other['is_accounting_report'] = True
 
 params = dict(at_date=at_date,
 precision=precision,
 section_uid=section_uid,
 simulation_state=simulation_state,
 omit_grouping_reference=omit_grouping_reference,
 period_start_date=period_start_date,
 movement_portal_type=portal.getPortalAccountingMovementTypeList(),
 no_mirror_section_uid_cache=1)
 
 if from_date:
 params['from_date'] = from_date
 
 result = []
 
 if len(simulation_state) > 1:
 account_columns = (
 ('Movement_getSpecificReference', 'Reference'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTitle', 'Title'),
 ('date', 'Date'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTranslatedPortalType', 'Type'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationReference', 'Invoice Number'),
 ('Movement_getMirrorSectionTitle', 'Third Party'),
 ('getTranslatedSimulationStateTitle', 'State'),
 ('debit', 'Debit'),
 ('credit', 'Credit'),
 ('running_total_price', 'Net'), )
 else:
 account_columns = (
 ('Movement_getSpecificReference', 'Reference'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTitle', 'Title'),
 ('date', 'Date'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTranslatedPortalType', 'Type'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationReference', 'Invoice Number'),
 ('Movement_getMirrorSectionTitle', 'Third Party'),
 ('debit', 'Debit'),
 ('credit', 'Credit'),
 ('running_total_price', 'Net'), )
 
 if gap:
 gap_value_list = cat_tool.gap.restrictedTraverse(gap)\
 .getCategoryChildValueList(is_self_excluded=0)
 else:
 cat = 'gap/%s' % (
 context.portal_preferences.getPreferredAccountingTransactionGap()
 or context.getPortalDefaultGapRoot())
 
 gap_value_list = cat_tool.resolveCategory(cat).getCategoryChildValueList()
 
 # we don't want to display accounts that don't have any transactions
 # associated, so we use a cache to see if the account contains transaction or
 # not ( regardless of from_date )
 account_inventory_list_cache = {}
 account_inventory_list_cache_params = params.copy()
 if account_inventory_list_cache_params.has_key('from_date'):
 del account_inventory_list_cache_params['from_date']
 
 for c in gap_value_list:
 # FIXME: this part is not working !
 account_list = c.getGapRelatedValueList(portal_type="Account")
 strict_account_list = c.getGapRelatedValueList(portal_type="Account",
 strict_membership=1)
 
 skip_branch = 1
 for account in account_list:
 if account.getUid() not in account_inventory_list_cache:
 account_inventory_list_cache[account.getUid()] = len(
 sim_tool.getMovementHistoryList(
 omit_simulation=1,
 node_uid=account.getUid(),
 **account_inventory_list_cache_params))
 if account_inventory_list_cache[account.getUid()] != 0:
 skip_branch = 0
 
 if skip_branch:
 continue
 
 if display_categories and \
 len(account_list) and \
 len(strict_account_list) != 1:
 result.append(ReportSection( path = c.getPhysicalPath()
 , title = "%s: %s" % (c.getId(), c.getTitle())
 , level = len(c.getPhysicalPath()) - 4
 , form_id = None
 ))
 
 if len(strict_account_list):
 for account in strict_account_list:
 if account.getAccountTypeId() in ('payable', 'receivable'):
 for third_party_brain in context.Account_zDistinctSectionList(
 at_date=at_date,
 simulation_state=simulation_state):
 third_party_params = params.copy()
 third_party_uid = third_party_brain.uid or " = NULL"
 third_party_params['mirror_section_uid'] = third_party_uid
 title = "%s: %s (%s)" % ( c.getId()
 , account.getTitle()
 , third_party_brain.title
 )
 if len(sim_tool.getMovementHistoryList(
 mirror_section_uid=third_party_uid,
 node_uid=account.getUid(),
 **account_inventory_list_cache_params)):
 result.append(ReportSection(
 path=account.getPhysicalPath(),
 title=title,
 form_id='Account_viewAccountingTransactionList',
 selection_name='acount_preference_selection',
 selection_params=third_party_params.copy(),
 selection_columns=account_columns,
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode',
 selection_sort_order=[('stock.date',
 'ascending')]))
 
 elif account.isMemberOf('account_type/asset/cash/bank'):
 # Bank Account
 for bank_account_brain in account.Account_zGetDistinctPaymentList(
 at_date=at_date,
 simulation_state=simulation_state):
 bank_params = params.copy()
 if bank_account_brain.path is not None:
 bank_account_uid = bank_account_brain.uid or " = NULL"
 bank_params['payment_uid'] = bank_account_uid
 title = "%s: %s (%s)" % ( c.getId()
 , account.getTitle()
 , bank_account_brain.title
 )
 else :
 bank_params['no_payment_uid'] = 1
 title = "%s: %s" % ( c.getId(), account.getTitle())
 if len(sim_tool.getMovementHistoryList(
 payment_uid=bank_account_uid,
 node_uid=account.getUid(),
 **account_inventory_list_cache_params)):
 result.append(ReportSection(
 path=account.getPhysicalPath(),
 title=title,
 form_id='Account_viewAccountingTransactionList',
 selection_name='accounting_report_selection',
 selection_params=bank_params.copy(),
 selection_columns=account_columns,
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode',
 selection_sort_order=[('stock.date',
 'ascending')]))
 elif len(sim_tool.getMovementHistoryList(
 node_uid=account.getUid(),
 **account_inventory_list_cache_params)):
 result.append(ReportSection(
 path=account.getPhysicalPath(),
 title="%s: %s" % (c.getId(), account.getTitle()),
 form_id='Account_viewAccountingTransactionList',
 selection_name='accounting_report_selection',
 selection_params=params,
 selection_columns=account_columns,
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode',
 selection_sort_order=[('stock.date',
 'ascending')]))
 total_params = params.copy()
 if gap:
 total_params['node_category'] = 'gap/%s' % gap
 result.append(ReportSection(
 path=context.getPhysicalPath(),
 title=N_("Total"),
 form_id='AccountModule_viewGeneralLedgerSummary',
 selection_name='accounting_report_selection',
 selection_params=total_params))
 
 return result
